mapper.select: select * from chapter join LECTURE using(LEC_NO) join CATEGORY using(CG_NO) where CHAP_NO = #{chapNo}

SELECT l.*, c.total_views FROM lecture l INNER JOIN ( SELECT lec_no, SUM(views) AS total_views FROM chapter GROUP BY lec_no ) c ON l.lec_no = c.lec_no ORDER BY c.total_views DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
